Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Apr 2019Could be, if you have a really long risk profile. The yield is likely to be higher...But you should probably invest in a diversified portfolio instead, where you can make 7%+ instead of 4%+ from an annuity. Investing is my specialty.
